thread.title: Learn Something: How To Turn Blues Scale Into Metal [News]
thread.title_full: Learn Something: How To Turn Blues Scale Into Metal [News]

title: Learn Something: How To Turn Blues Scale Into Metal [News]
text:
Posted 6 hours ago 7 
Guitar instructor Robert Baker presented an interesting video lesson, explaining how to turn the ole blues scale into metal. 
The musician explained: "We're just gonna say this is the only scale you know, and you wanna play metal. So how can you get there? I have 5 different examples here that we're gonna go through, lots of different ways of applying the blues scale to make it sound metal. 
For tabs and additional info, consult the man's official site . The lesson is available below.
